items.sentence: Tom knew Mary told John to ask Alice not to do that.
Tom continued working even though he was very tired.
Tom decided that it would be fun to try paragliding.
Tom asked Mary to help him with his science project.
Tom cut off a piece of meat and put it on his plate.
When was the last time you ate a home-cooked dinner?
I\'m tired of watching TV. Let\'s do something else.
I\'m very thankful for all that you\'ve done for me.
If you hadn\'t had my advice, you would have failed.
Tom has decided not to do anything about the matter.
